description:
How to screw up hiring
.. Hiring is hard, it's hard to do well, it's easy to do badly. Here's some things to avoid!
.. Kristian Glass
  
Assembly Room 2018-09-18 12:30-13:00
  
Hiring is hard, it's hard to do well, it's easy to do badly. Here's some things to avoid!

Maybe you control hiring decisions at work, maybe you're an interviewer or applicant reviewer, or maybe you're trying to be hired somewhere - chances are you're exposed to the hiring process somehow.

There's so many things you can do that are inadvertently problematic, and they're so easy to do without realising.

I'll show you a selection of things that people do, with all the best intentions, and the problems that can arise, so you can avoid them and do better!
title: How to screw up hiring
